data.meta_description: We bring you the future as it happens. From the latest in science and technology to the big stories in business and culture, we've got you covered.

recommendations: Meta description is too short, aim for 120-160 characters
Improve heading hierarchy structure
Improve text to HTML ratio, aim for at least 15%
Include main keywords in the H1 heading
Aim for keyword density between 1.5-2.5% for primary keywords
Consider adding multimedia content for engagement
Add structured data like Schema.org markup
Reduce page size to improve load speed
Add descriptive anchor text to internal links
Add hreflang tags if targeting multiple languages/regions
